1331110.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Animations Select - Fire
1331110.description:
“Animations Select” is a series of premium animation asset packs designed to provide game designers with flexible and affordable options to upgrade specific areas of their projects. Unlike "Animations Collection", the focus of each "Animations Select" is much narrower; the former provides breadth, the latter provides depth, and in this case... FIRE! Lots of explosive, bright, blasting fire animations to bring some combustible activity to your games!

Features:

* 2 casting animations.
* 6 skill animations.
* 2 full-screen skill animations.
* 60 FPS and 30 FPS versions of each animation, for a total of 20 animation sheets.
* For use with RPG Maker VX Ace or the engine of your choice!

* Please Note: included Demo Project is for RPG Maker MV only
1331110.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 意大利语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 日语
